basic_info.description: My name is Maximiliano Zeballos. Enthusiast for web development and simple but aesthetically correct and consistent designs. I'm working with the newest front-end frameworks like React and Angular. I love teamwork, nothing better than several heads thinking in sync. My native language is Spanish (you can change the language of the web) and I have a solid and decent base of Portuguese.

projects.title: Individual project about countries
projects.description: The most extended application I have had the opportunity to work with. I have learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by an awesome teacher. The application has filtering by Country, Population, Continents, search bar, allows you to search information about different countries from my own REST API.

projects.title: Clothing e-Commerce
projects.description: Personal project for a studio assignment. I was in charge of the design, as well as working on the logic part of the filtering, payment gateways, authentications, etc. I passed the same project, as well as I got an outstanding grade.

projects.title: Space agency website
projects.description: This project involved creating a fictional space travel agency using React. The goal of the project was to refine skills and practice personal knowledge in the use of this popular JavaScript library for web application development.

projects.title: Form-Simil Google
projects.description: The registration form is generated from a .json file that contains information about the fields that should be displayed. The information entered in the form is saved in Firebase and is used to load the table component. The form has validations based on the information specified in the .json file. The link provided below will redirect you to the website. If you want to view the repository, you should go to my github profile.

projects.title: Go-Travel-app
projects.description: Travel-Go is an application developed using React Native, Routing, Native Icons and TailwindCSS. The app is designed for travelers and helps them search for restaurants, attractions, and hotels. With its modern design, the app makes it easy for users to find the information they need for their travels.

projects.title: Netflix-Clone
projects.description: This project is a replica of the popular streaming platform, Netflix, built using Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Framer Motion, FireBase, Google Auth, and Stripe. Although it's not finished yet, you can see a live preview of the work by visiting the link within the screenshots or check out the code on my GitHub.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
technologies: Helping in personal and group development
